title: Inventory Hold Released Event
description: Published when an inventory hold is released and stock becomes available for allocation again. This completes the hold lifecycle and returns the held quantity to the available-to-promise pool. Holds may be released after quality approval, credit clearance, administrative resolution, or regulatory compliance confirmation.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit identifier - the unique product code within the inventory system

hold_id.description: Unique identifier of the hold being released, correlating to the original InventoryHoldPlaced event

quantity_released.description: Number of units being released from hold. This quantity is added back to the available-to-promise calculation.

released_by.description: User identifier (email or username) or system process that authorized the hold release. Used for audit trail and accountability.
